price: Or He can capsize them[20] for what they committed, but He pardons much,
arabic: أَوۡ يُوبِقۡهُنَّ بِمَا كَسَبُواْ وَيَعۡفُ عَن كَثِيرٖ
footnotes: [20] i.e., He could sink the ships by violent winds.
